Name: The American Dream
About the game: Samurai Punk presents The American Dream, a satirical virtual reality trip to a ‘brighter future’ where your everyday needs are solved with guns. It's the 1950’s and a group of leading gun manufacturers have constructed a vast complex to guide the American Patriot towards a better and richer life. With the talking dog Buddy Washington as your guide, you'll get to experience what it's like to live all aspects of your life with guns. Fully-voiced, single player, narrative-driven campaign with over 20 unique levels. Learn how guns can help improve the key moments of your life as an Average American. Experience immersive, interactive environments ready to meet the business end of your weapons. A host of lovingly crafted firearms including pistols, shotguns, SMGs and tactical sporting rifles. Bullets. Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
